Job Description

Accounts Receivable/Credit Clerk- TalentZok

Overview

Are you looking for a new career opportunity with an exciting company?! Then we've got the right team for you! In this role, you're responsible for the duties listed below.

Immediate opening for an Accounts Receivable/Credit Clerk in El Monte, CA who possesses:

  • Accounts Receivable/Credit - 1 yr. (with Education - School/Internship experience ok)
  • Recent AA/BA Accounting/Business
  • MS Office Suites - Excel - Intermediate+/SAP a + (pivot tables/v & z lookups)

Email resumes to sgriner@talentzok.com or call 424.488.7104.

FULL DESCRIPTION: Our client is seeking a skilled Accounts Receivable Assistant to join our growing Company. In this position, you will be responsible for providing support and assistance to the A/R Department, Credit, our customers, and other departments as needed. We have great benefits and are looking for someone that is looking for long-term growth.

The selected candidate will be responsible for:

  • Update credit reports and credit references as scheduled or as needed
  • Research and resolve customers' discrepancies
  • File and maintain documents electronically
  • Assist Credit Department as needed

The selected candidate will also possess:

  • Associate's degree with one-year related experience
  • Experience with MS Office; strong Microsoft Excel skills and SAP B1 experience preferred
  • Excellent organizational skills, high attention to detail, ability to meet strict deadlines
  • Aptitude for critical thinking, problem solving, and decision making
  • Outstanding communication skills, able to work well independently and on a team

Salary Range: $23-$25/hr

For immediate and confidential consideration, please email your resume to sgriner@talentzok.com or call 424.488.7104. More information can be found at www.talentzok.com

Company Description

TalentZok was founded in 2008 and has been repeatedly recognized as one of San Diego County's fastest growing businesses. In 2022, we were named Business Journal's 'Best Places to Work'. Even as our competitors are scaling back and laying off staff, TalentZok is expanding to new markets and hiring additional staff in existing offices.
